title: Online Study Forum
user_stories:
As a user, I want to create tasks so that I can accomplish my goal.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Should be easy to use
- Should be functional and responsive

As a user, I want to view tasks so that I can accomplish my goal.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Should be easy to use
- Should be functional and responsive

As a user, I want to update tasks so that I can accomplish my goal.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Should be easy to use
- Should be functional and responsive

As a user, I want to delete tasks so that I can accomplish my goal.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Should be easy to use
- Should be functional and responsive

As a user, I want to download reports as pdf so that I can accomplish my goal.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Should be easy to use
- Should be functional and responsive
